channel.title: Members Objects
channel.description:
ok so heres my problem,
i hav beene dting a source for a while now
and iv just found a problem , how do i change it so you dont have to be a member to wear certain things
so what happens is i log on try to wear lets say a dragon chain and it says "you need to be member to use this item"
how do i turn/delite this?
any help much appreaicated
lewis`

item.title: Members Objects
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

Teh Moose:

search in client.java for the message saying you need to be a member to use this. then it sould say above it something like “if playerismem = 0” change the 0 to something else

that didnt work, there is no “You need to be member to equip this item” in client.java, you sure its the right file?

Read full topic
